LanguageData.Annihilator_MainCannon.label: лазпушка «Буревестник»
LanguageData.Annihilator_MainCannon.description: Typically mounted as the twin-linked unit on the Predator Annihilator tanks, the Stormbringer lascannon is a devastating energy weapon known for its ability to unleash a torrent of searing energy capable of obliterating heavily armored targets with pinpoint precision.
LanguageData.Annihilator_MainCannon.fireModes.0.label: стрельба очередями
LanguageData.Annihilator_MainCannon.fireModes.1.label: стрельба одиночными выстрелами
